OmniProcess.Description: Demonstrates how a single document can be generated using a DOCX or PPTX template. Uses LWC for generation.
OmniProcess.Name: Single Doc - DOCX (LWC)

OmniProcessElement.Description:
context-id -- SObjectId like QuoteId, OpportunityId,OrderId & ContractId
selected-template -- selected Template JSON node from previous step. 
debug -- optional for debugging
document-title  -- Overrides the Default Document Name/Title of your document
